content:
---
### 求解思路
对题目中给出的6种不同条件取反即为不满足的条件
1. `len(password) < 8`
2. `all(not c.islower() for c in password)`
3. `all(not c.isupper() for c in password)`
3. `all(not c.isdigit()  for c in password)`
4. `all(c not in set("!@#$%^&*()-+") for c in password)`
5. `any(password[i] == password[i+1] for i in range(len(password)-1))`

### 代码

```python3
class Solution:
    def strongPasswordCheckerII(self, password: str) -> bool:
        if (len(password) < 8 or 
            all(not c.islower() for c in password) or 
            all(not c.isupper() for c in password) or 
            all(not c.isdigit()  for c in password) or 
            all(c not in set("!@#$%^&*()-+") for c in password) or 
            any(password[i] == password[i+1] for i in range(len(password)-1))):
            return False
        return True
```
